author: quadratin.slp
title: Promueve DIF Municipal c√°ncer de mama con detecci√≥n oportuna - Noticias de San Luis Potos√≠
text:
SAN LUIS POTOS√ç, SLP., 4 de abril de 2024.- El DIF Municipal de San Luis Potos√≠ promueve la prevenci√≥n del c√°ncer de mama a trav√©s de la detecci√≥n oportuna mediante el esc√°ner mamario que se realiza en los servicios integrales de salud que cada d√≠a se instalan en una colonia diferente de la ciudad, por lo que se invita a la ciudadan√≠a a mantenerse al pendiente de las redes sociales oficiales de la instituci√≥n y solicitar mayores informes, para lo que pueden acudir a Xicot√©ncatl 1650, col. Himno Nacional, o comunicarse a los n√∫meros 4448151307 y 4448155118 en un horario de 8:00 a 15:00 horas, de lunes a viernes.
Se insisti√≥ a la poblaci√≥n a acudir a solicitar dicho servicio, que es totalmente gratuito para las y los potosinos, ya que el exhorto tambi√©n es para los hombres en quienes se ha detectado esta enfermedad.
Las revisiones deben realizarse peri√≥dicamente con su ginec√≥logo y/o especialista, o a los espacios donde se dispone de esc√°ner mamario para detectar en etapas tempranas esta enfermedad y puedan ser tratadas con tiempo para su erradicaci√≥n.
Por lo que se refiere a esta instituci√≥n, cuando en revisiones se detecta alguna anormalidad o signo de alerta, se brinda informaci√≥n complementaria respecto al c√°ncer de mama y se canaliza a terapia psicol√≥gica individual o de pareja, as√≠ como con los especialistas adecuados para tener un diagn√≥stico m√°s certero y que la persona acuda a tratamiento.
Se comparte esta informaci√≥n por su relevancia para el p√∫blico en general; es ajena a cualquier partido pol√≠tico.

author: Patricia Calder√≥n
title: 'Escondi meu beb√™ no forro do teto' diz brasileira sobre chuvas na Espanha
text:
Internacional 'Escondi meu beb√™ no forro do teto' diz brasileira sobre chuvas na Espanha Patricia Calder√≥n Colabora√ß√£o para o UOL 01/11/2024 05h30 0:00 / 0:00
Siga UOL Not√≠cias no A empres√°ria baiana Gleice Baltazar Santos, 40 anos, falou com exclusividade ao UOL e relatou o que passou durante as enchentes que mataram pelo menos 150 pessoas em Val√™ncia, a terceira maior cidade da Espanha, na √∫ltima ter√ßa, 29. Dezenas continuam desaparecidos, segundo as autoridades locais. A brasileira, que mora na cidade, tem um
O que aconteceu Gleice deu √† luz h√° duas semanas e estava sozinha com o beb√™ quando a √°gua invadiu a casa dela. Ela mora num pr√©dio que tem 2 andares, a unidade dela fica no t√©rreo.
"Foi catastr√≥fico, horr√≠vel. A √°gua subiu muito r√°pido. Quando olhei para o lado, j√° vi geladeira e fog√£o flutuando com tanta √°gua. Perdi tudo. Entrei em desespero com √°gua na cintura, e precisava salvar meu beb√™. Escondi meu filho no forro do teto do apartamento para ele n√£o morrer afogado
Gleice Baltazar Santos, empres√°ria
Josias de Souza
Maduro d√° a Lula a chance do reposicionamento
Valmir Salaro
Caso Marielle: pena de 70 anos ou mais tanto faz
Thais Bilenky
Lula liberou apoio a Motta quando j√° era irrevers√≠vel
Mauro Cezar
Diferen√ßas entre Guardiola e os cartolas do Flamengo
Na Espanha h√° 18 anos, a empres√°ria √© m√£e solo e vende roupas. Matteo, de 14 dias, foi resgatado por uma vizinha. "Eu precisava tirar meu filho do local, tive muita sorte de vizinha do apartamento de cima me ajudar. Se n√£o fosse por ela, talvez n√£o estivesse aqui para contar a hist√≥ria. Agrade√ßo a Deus por estarmos vivos. S√£o muitas pessoas mortas e desaparecidas, e por um milagre, estamos bem"
Gleice e Matteo est√£o na casa de amigos no centro de Val√™ncia. "Ainda n√£o retornei para casa. Moro praticamente a 5 passos do rio que transbordou. N√£o sei como ser√° daqui para frente". Gleice est√° sendo mantida com ajuda de amigos e doa√ß√µes da popula√ß√£o local.
Epicentro da trag√©dia
Regi√£o de Paiporta, onde o brasileira mora, foi a mais atingida pela enchente Imagem: Cedido ao UOL O maior impacto foi sentido em Paiporta, na Comunidade Valenciana, onde a brasileira mora com o filho. Segundo o jornal espanhol El Mundo, Paiporta √© o Epicentro da trag√©dia com 60 mortos. Seis destas vitimas fatais estavam em um asilo na regi√£o.
"Muitos desaparecidos" . O n√∫mero de mortos ainda pode crescer, afirmou o ministro da Pol√≠cia Territorial, √Ångel Victor Torres: "Infelizmente tudo leva a crer que esta cifra vai aumentar".
Continua ap√≥s a publicidade Rastros de destrui√ß√£o. V√≠deos que circulam nas redes sociais mostram que pontes e edif√≠cios foram destru√≠dos. Meteorologistas disseram √† Reuters que a chuva de um ano caiu em apenas oito horas em Val√™ncia. Algumas √°reas do munic√≠pio ficaram sem servi√ßo de telefonia e energia el√©trica nesta quarta-feira (30).
Aemet registrou 445,4 mm de chuva em 24 horas em Val√™ncia. √â a maior precipita√ß√£o em um dia na prov√≠ncia desde 11 de setembro de 1996, quando ca√≠ram 520 mm em Tavernes de la Vall e 86 pessoas morreram. A m√©dia anual de precipita√ß√£o na regi√£o √© cerca de 500 mm, segundo a Metsul
Parte de Val√™ncia est√° inacess√≠vel. As estradas est√£o inundadas, e os sistemas de transporte a√©reo e ferrovi√°rio foram gravemente impactados na prov√≠ncia espanhola. "Reiteramos a import√¢ncia de n√£o fazer deslocamentos por estrada nas prov√≠ncias afetadas na regi√£o", afirmou o presidente regional do leste de Val√™ncia, Carlos Maz√≥n.
Veja fotos da enchente em Val√™ncia

author: Narendra Modi
title: PM Modi on Swami Smaranananda: A Viksit Bharat blessed by seers | The Indian Express
text: Amidst the hustle and bustle of the grand festival of Lok Sabha elections, the news of the demise of Srimat Swami Smaranananda ji Maharaj brought my mind to a standstill for a few moments. Srimat Swami Smaranananda ji Maharaj was a pioneer of India‚Äôs spiritual consciousness and his demise is like a personal loss. A few years ago, the demise of Swami Atmasthananda ji, and now the departure of Swami Smaranananda ji on his eternal journey, has left many people bereaved. My heart, like that of crores of devotees, saints and followers of the Ramakrishna Math and Mission, is deeply saddened. During my visit to [Kolkata](https://indianexpress.com/section/cities/kolkata) earlier this month, I had gone to the hospital to enquire about Swami Smaranananda ji‚Äôs health. Just like Swami Atmasthananda ji, Swami Smaranananda ji too dedicated his entire life for spreading the ideas of Acharya Ramakrishna Paramahamsa, Mata Sharada Devi and Swami Vivekananda across the world. While writing this article, the memories of meetings and conversations with him are getting refreshed in my mind. In January 2020, during my stay at Belur Math, I meditated in the room of Swami Vivekananda. During that visit, I had a long conversation about Swami Atmasthananda ji with Swami Smaranananda ji. It is widely known that I had a close relationship with the Ramakrishna Mission and Belur Math. As a seeker of spirituality, I have met different saints and mahatmas and been to many places over the period of more than five decades. Even in Ramakrishna Math, I got to know about the saints who dedicated their lives to spirituality, among whom personalities like Swami Atmasthananda ji and Swami Smaranananda ji were prominent. Their sacred thoughts and knowledge provided contentment to my mind. In the most important period of my life, such saints taught me the true principle of Jan Seva hi Prabhu Seva. The lives of Swami Atmasthananda ji and Swami Smaranananda ji are an indelible example of the motto of Ramakrishna Mission ‚ÄúAtmano Mokshaartham Jagaddhitaaya Cha‚Äù. We all are inspired by the work being done by the Ramakrishna Mission for the promotion of education and rural development. The Ramakrishna Mission is working on India‚Äôs spiritual enlightenment, educational empowerment and humanitarian service. In 1978, when the disastrous flood struck Bengal, the Ramakrishna Mission won everyone‚Äôs hearts with its selfless service. I remember, when an earthquake ravaged Kutch in 2001, Swami Atmasthananda ji was among the first people to call me and offer all possible assistance for disaster management on behalf of the Ramakrishna Mission. Under his direction, the Mission helped many people who were affected by the earthquake. Over the past years, while holding various positions, Swami Atmasthananda ji and Swami Smaranananda ji laid great emphasis on social empowerment. Those who know the lives of these great personalities will definitely remember how serious these saints were towards modern education, skilling and women empowerment. Among his many inspiring traits, one thing that impressed me the most was Swami Atmasthananda ji‚Äôs love and respect for every culture and every tradition. The reason for this was that he used to travel continuously and had spent a long time in different parts of India. He learned to speak Gujarati while living in Gujarat. He used to even speak with me in the language and I loved listening to his Gujarati! At different points in India‚Äôs development journey, our motherland has been blessed by many saints and seers like Swami Atmasthananda ji and Swami Smaranananda ji who have ignited the spark of societal change. They have motivated us to work with a collective spirit and address all the challenges our society faces. These principles are eternal and will act as our source of strength as we embark on developing a Viksit Bharat during the Amrit Kaal. Once again, on behalf of the entire nation, I pay homage to such saintly souls. I am confident that all the people associated with the Ramakrishna Mission will move ahead on the path shown by them. Om Shanti. The writer is the Prime Minister of India Away from the national capital‚Äôs courtroom where the [case against Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal is playing out](https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/delhi/political-conspiracy-delhi-cm-arvind-kejriwal-l-g-jail-remark-9237962/), two key figures embroiled in the excise policy case ‚Äì four-time MP Magunta Srinivasulu Reddy and his son Raghava Magunta Reddy ‚Äì are busy campaigning for BJP ally Telugu Desam Party (TDP)

author: @thecryptobasic
title: Why Ethereum‚Äôs Smart Contracts Are One of Its Best Features
text: Blockchain has emerged as a game-changing technology, disrupting numerous industries by providing a decentralized and safe solution for making transactions. One of the most common uses of blockchain is implementing smart contracts. But what are they, and how do they work? First of all, smart contracts have everything to do with Ethereum, the 2nd leading digital asset in the crypto market which you can buy on the [Binance](https://www.binance.com/en/price/ethereum) platform. Ethereum was also the one to bring the concept of automation to life and shape the future of blockchain technology. To be fair, trying to make sense of blockchain and all its related aspects can feel like an attempt to solve a Rubik‚Äôs cube in a room with no light ‚Äì it‚Äôs truly daunting. If this concept is too complicated for you, we‚Äôre here to shine a light on smart contracts to help you grasp everything from how it functions to its benefits and the industries making the most of this new and appealing tech advancement. Breaking Down the Concept of Smart Contracts If you are familiar with the blockchain space, you may have heard about smart contracts before. But what are they, really? If you‚Äôre associating them with paper contracts ‚Äì but smarter- you‚Äôre not wrong. Simply put, Ethereum smart contracts run on the Ethereum blockchain and are self-executing. This means that the terms of the agreement are written into code, executing automatically once specific conditions have been met. Smart contracts not only eliminate the need for an intermediary, but they also leave no room for misinterpretation. Since smart contracts automate contract execution, they save time and reduce the risk of human mistakes, making them ideal for different industries, including supply chain management, banking, and real estate. Some examples of Ethereum smart contracts include: - Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). As the name suggests, these are companies run by smart contracts, operating based on rules written into the contract. - Decentralized Exchanges (DEXes). They are platforms that allow you to trade digital assets without requiring an intermediary.The smart contract is like a trusty referee that ensures everyone plays fair. - Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs). You can think of ICOs as fundraisers ‚Äì except that you don‚Äôt sell car washes or cookies but cryptocurrencies. The smart contract‚Äôs role is to manage the sale to ensure all parties get their fair share. The Incredible Advantages of Ethereum Smart Contracts Ethereum smart contracts provide numerous benefits to individuals and businesses alike. They decrease transaction costs while boosting efficiency, as an intermediary is no longer needed. The smart contract does the entire job, acting like an efficient personal assistant who doesn‚Äôt make any errors. Due to their self-executing nature, smart contracts ensure that the agreement terms are enforced automatically, boosting transaction transparency and security. One of smart contracts‚Äô highlights is the element of trust. Since they ensure prompt execution of transactions based on specified conditions, the possibilities for error, manipulation or human bias are significantly lower. More than 70% of executives see smart contracts as an innovative tool that will shape the future of business. Moreover, the market for DeFi apps built on the Ethereum blockchain has risen exponentially in only a few years, showing the potential of smart contracts to revolutionize how companies operate. Sectors That Are Making the Most of Ethereum Smart Contracts Ethereum smart contracts are used in different industries, including supply chain, real estate, gaming, FinTech, banking, etc. Smart contracts offer efficient solutions to these businesses, allowing them to operate as efficiently as possible. For instance, smart contracts streamline payroll processing in the HR sector, resulting in accurate and timely salary disbursement according to predefined conditions, including company policies and work hours. The technology of smart contracts can also benefit the recruitment process by encoding the terms of employment offers, thus resulting in transparent and seamless job acceptance processes. Healthcare is another sector where smart contracts are making their mark. By streamlining patient data management, smart contracts allow authorized healthcare providers to access essential information safely and promptly. Healthcare gains enormously from including blockchain smart contracts, and one of the most notable benefits is the potential to revolutionize clinical trial conduct. This is achieved by recording trial data safely and ensuring the results‚Äô integrity and transparency. The gaming industry is also going through a transformation due to smart contracts that enhance players‚Äô experiences and enable more autonomy by providing ownership of in-game assets represented by NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Smart contracts technology encourages fair play through the enforcement of game rules and governance of randomized events in an auditable and transparent way. Moreover, they enable play-to-earn models, which are an innovative monetization tool. Through their programmable nature, smart contracts blend digital activities with visible economic perks, automating the distribution of real-life rewards related to in-game actions. Are There Any Limitations in Adopting Smart Contracts? As much as we‚Äôd like to say smart contracts are perfect, that‚Äôs far from true. Although understanding how Ethereum smart contracts work unlocks many benefits, discussing the limitations is also imperative. Smart contracts are just like a coin ‚Äì they have two different sides, and one of them is not so bright. Firstly, immutability is one of smart contracts‚Äô main characteristics, meaning that once you create a contract, it is impossible to change it in any way. It‚Äôs like writing words in wet cement ‚Äì they remain there forever. Well, the same applies to smart contracts, potentially representing a problem if conditions change or an error is made. Another limitation of smart contracts is associated with the legal framework. There are still many locations around the world where smart contracts‚Äô legality is still ambiguous. It‚Äôs like exploring an unknown territory without any ideas of what could happen along the way. Moreover, the issue of privacy is also major. Think of it as living in a house that has glass walls ‚Äì although it may look great, everyone can see inside, invading your privacy. And no, we aren‚Äôt talking metaphorically ‚Äì your privacy is actually compromised due to Ethereum smart contracts transparency. Although it is perceived as a good thing -which it is, as it enhances trust ‚Äì transparency allows all network users to see what you‚Äôre doing, which is less than ideal. Looking Towards the Future As reports show, the global smart contract market will reach $1.4 billion two years from now, an increase of 25.2% from 2020. There‚Äôs no doubt that Ethereum smart contracts hold great potential in the future, so we can expect to see further adoption, expansion of DApps, emergence of new use cases, and so on. Overall, we can expect Ethereum smart contracts to experience further development in the years to come. Follow Us on [Facebook.](https://www.facebook.com/thecryptobasic/) Disclaimer: This content is informational and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author's personal opinions and do not reflect The Crypto Basic‚Äôs opinion. Readers are encouraged to do thorough research before making any investment decisions. The Crypto Basic is not responsible for any financial losses. -Advertisement-

author: Daniella Mazo Gonz√°lez
title: Colfecar advierte que nueva resoluci√≥n de MinAmbiente podr√≠a colapsar el acceso a Bogot√° - Infobae
text:
La resoluci√≥n del Ministerio de Ambiente, que busca establecer criterios de ordenamiento en la Sabana, es objeto de cr√≠ticas por parte de diversos sectores econ√≥micos - cr√©dito Colprensa El gremio del transporte de carga, representado por Colfecar, expres√≥ su rechazo a la resoluci√≥n emitida por el Ministerio de Ambiente sobre el ordenamiento de la Sabana de Bogot√°. La organizaci√≥n advirti√≥ que esta medida podr√≠a generar la par√°lisis de importantes proyectos de infraestructura, afectando la movilidad y el desarrollo log√≠stico de la capital.
Seg√∫n Colfecar, la situaci√≥n del transporte de carga en Bogot√° ya enfrenta serios problemas debido a las dificultades de acceso a la ciudad. ‚ÄúIngresar a Bogot√° implica para una tractomula entre 3 y 4 horas adicionales por cualquiera de sus v√≠as de acceso‚Äù, indic√≥ el gremio en su pronunciamiento. Esta demora impacta directamente los costos operativos y la competitividad del sector, generando sobrecostos en el transporte de mercanc√≠as.
Ahora puede seguirnos en nuestro WhatsApp Channel y en Facebook .
La resoluci√≥n del Ministerio de Ambiente, que busca establecer criterios de ordenamiento en la Sabana, es objeto de cr√≠ticas por parte de diversos sectores econ√≥micos. Desde Colfecar se√±alan que la medida no tuvo en cuenta el impacto sobre la movilidad de carga y la infraestructura vial, lo que podr√≠a agravar a√∫n m√°s la congesti√≥n en los accesos a Bogot√°.
En ese sentido, el gremio hizo un llamado al Gobierno para que revise la normativa y abra espacios de concertaci√≥n con los actores afectados. ‚ÄúEs fundamental que las decisiones de ordenamiento territorial no generen bloqueos al desarrollo econ√≥mico y productivo del pa√≠s‚Äù, se√±al√≥ Colfecar.
Noticia en desarrollo...

author: Kim Jarrett | The Center Square
title: Iowans get an income tax break in 2024
text: (The Center Square) ‚Äî Iowans will keep more of their money in their pockets in 2024. The state's top marginal income tax rate will roll back Jan. 1, 2024, from 6% to 5.7%. Gov. Kim Reynolds said in September more are likely when lawmakers convene in January. The state ended fiscal year 2023 with a $1.83 billion surplus. "Some see a surplus as government not spending enough, but I view it as an over collection from the hard-working men and women of Iowa," [Reynolds said](https://www.thecentersquare.com/iowa/article_681f83c2-5d71-11ee-a33f-c76f9bdbfb22.html). "We've seen what the powerful combination of growth-oriented policies and fiscal restraint can create, and now it's time for Iowans to directly receive the benefits. I look forward to cutting taxes again next legislative session and returning this surplus back to where it belongs ‚Äî the people of Iowa." The income tax cuts signed by Reynolds in 2022 are a step toward a 3.9% flat income tax rate by 2026. The corporate tax rates will drop from 8.4% to 7.1% for businesses with more than $100,000 in income. Companies with less than $100,000 in revenue will pay 5.5%. Lawmakers also slashed the inheritance tax from 4% to 2% and the franchise tax from 4.7% to 4.4% beginning in 2024. These are the second round of tax cuts enacted by Reynolds in the legislature. Last year's cuts returned $561 million to the taxpayers but did not hurt the state's financial position, the [Revenue Estimating Conference](https://www.thecentersquare.com/iowa/article_e3f8d7fe-99ea-11ee-a894-5319628225af.html) said earlier this month. No adjustments are needed to the fiscal year 2024 budget, according to Committee Chair Kraig Paulsen. The general fund revenue for Iowa is projected at $9.6 billion for fiscal year 2025, according to the committee. Iowa lawmakers return to Des Moines for the 2024 legislative session on Jan. 8. Reynolds will address the Legislature on Jan. 9.

author: Daniela Tost√≥n
title: El tiempo en Telde para hoy: alerta amarilla por temperaturas m√°ximas y fen√≥menos costeros
text: Seg√∫n la AEMET: los term√≥metros sufrir√°n ligeros cambios si se tiene en cuenta que las m√°ximas registrar√°n 29 al tiempo que las m√≠nimas se mantendr√°n en los 21 La Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET) ha activado la alerta amarilla por temperaturas m√°ximas y fen√≥menos costeros durante este viernes en el sur y este y oeste de Gran Canaria, donde se encuentra Telde. El municipio se ver√° marcado por cielos muy nubosos desde la madrugada hasta las 06:00 horas, momento en el que se reducir√° la nubosidad , para finalizar la jornada con un escenario despejado. Las m√°ximas sufrir√°n pocos cambios con respecto a ayer, alcanzando los 29 grados , mientras que las m√≠nimas seguir√°n sobre los 21 (pero con una sensaci√≥n t√©rmica m√°xima de 30 grados) . El viento aparecer√° en esta localidad con direcci√≥n norte. A continuaci√≥n se indica la evoluci√≥n semanal del tiempo en Telde; concretamente, a la izquierda se muestra el estado del cielo de cada d√≠a junto a la probabilidad de precipitaciones, seguido de la temperatura m√≠nima y m√°xima que registrar√°n los term√≥metros. El tiempo de ma√±ana Por su parte, el s√°bado ser√° un d√≠a despejado. Las temperaturas en Telde tendr√°n valores pr√≥ximos a los de hoy, al situarse la m√°xima en 30 grados y la m√≠nima en 23 . El viento soplar√° con direcci√≥n norte. El tiempo de pasado ma√±ana El domingo no existir√≠a probabilidad de precipitaciones , dado que un panorama con pocas nubes ser√≠a la t√≥nica general durante las 24 horas. La temperatura m√°xima permanecer√° en torno a los 30 grados, si bien no habr√° muchos cambios en cuanto a la m√≠nima . El viento aparecer√° con direcci√≥n norte. El tiempo en otros municipios Con respecto a otros municipios cercanos, se prev√©n variaciones en los cielos de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria , teniendo en cuenta que habr√° cielos cubiertos en la primera parte del d√≠a y un ambiente de abundantes nubes desde mitad del d√≠a. Los term√≥metros registrar√°n valores m√≠nimos de 22 grados y m√°ximos de 25. En Santa Luc√≠a de Tirajana , tendr√°n lugar cielos despejados, y no se esperan demasiadas variaciones. La temperatura m√≠nima ser√° de 24 grados, mientras que la m√°xima ser√° de 37. Esta es la previsi√≥n meteorol√≥gica en otras localidades: Santa Cruz de Tenerife C√°diz Ceuta Huelva Jerez de la Frontera Estepona Barcelona Calahorra Getxo Soria Castelldefels Oviedo San Sebasti√°n Le√≥n * Datos del tiempo en Telde con informaci√≥n elaborada utilizando, entre otras, la obtenida de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET). En cualquier caso, esta informaci√≥n debe considerarse provisional a la espera de pr√≥ximas actualizaciones. La Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET) ha activado la alerta amarilla por temperaturas m√°ximas y fen√≥menos costeros durante este viernes en el sur y este y oeste de Gran Canaria, donde se encuentra Telde. El municipio se ver√° marcado por cielos muy nubosos desde la madrugada hasta las 06:00 horas, momento en el que se reducir√° la nubosidad , para finalizar la jornada con un escenario despejado.

author: heavymetal762
title: Nikki Haley Attempts To Walk Back Viral 'Civil War' Answer That Went Viral - Page 3 - AR15.COM
text:
Quote History Originally Posted By ras_al_ghul:
The south seceded because they saw the writing on the wall with regards to slavery, Lincoln was just the cherry on top. Mostly it was because all future states would be admitted as abolitionist states and inevitably cause a nationwide banning of slavery.
The north attacked the south because they more or less decided it was illegal to succeed from the United States and the south tried to claim federal property.
The south attacked the north because the north attacked the south. The north attacked the south because they succeeded so that could continue to have slaves.
The southern states all listed slavery as the reason for succession, the Confederate constitution required that all member states allow slavery (they banned slave bans effectively), and the last of the slave states to be freed by the 14th amendment were in the north (Delaware if I recall).
My entire post ignores the social and economic tit-for-tat between the north and south that existed for decades culminating in a civil war. Those would be other contributory reasons for the war, but they all ultimately lead back to slavery as an underlying cause.
View Quote
Just.... no.

author: Erick Chavez
title: Diego Dorregaray y su mensaje al hincha de Universitario: "Le prometo mucho sacrificio"
text: El [delantero argentino](https://rpp.pe/noticias/diego-dorregaray) dijo estar contento de llegar a [Universitario ](https://rpp.pe/noticias/universitario-de-deportes)y prometi√≥ "mucho sacrificio" El delantero argentino [Diego Dorregaray](https://rpp.pe/noticias/diego-dorregaray) prometi√≥ a los hinchas de [Universitario de Deportes](https://rpp.pe/noticias/universitario-de-deportes) ‚Äúmucho sacrificio‚Äù para alcanzar los objetivos trazados en la presente temporada, como el bicampeonato en el a√±o del Centenario del club. En declaraciones a los medios deportivos, el exjugador del Nea Salamina declar√≥ estar ‚Äúmuy contento‚Äù de estar en la 'U' y que se encuentra a disposici√≥n del t√©cnico Fabi√°n Bustos, quien sustituy√≥ al uruguayo [Jorge Fossati](https://rpp.pe/noticias/jorge-fossati), nuevo estratega de la [Selecci√≥n Peruana](https://rpp.pe/noticias/seleccion-peruana). "Le prometo mucho sacrificio al hincha de Universitario y que lo vamos a dar todo para conseguir los objetivos trazados. Los chicos han dejado la valla alta porque salieron campeones, pero ac√° estamos dispuestos a dejarlo todo", declar√≥ Diego Dorregaray. El atacante argentino de 31 a√±os evit√≥ prometer una cantidad de goles, aunque s√≠ sacrificio, despu√©s de haber anotado 16 veces con la camiseta de Nea Salamina. Suscr√≠bete a nuestro canal [RPP Deportes en YouTube]y disfruta del contenido deportivo del Per√∫ y el mundo. Diego Dorregaray y sus n√∫meros El delantero argentino de 31 a√±os empez√≥ su carrera en Barracas de su pa√≠s natal, donde apenas jug√≥ un partido. Luego, recal√≥ en Atlanta. En el cuadro argentino disput√≥ 28 encuentros y anot√≥ diez goles. Esto le permiti√≥ dar el salto al exterior, precisamente a Guayaquil City. En cuadro ecuatoriano, jug√≥ 33 partidos e hizo ocho tantos. Tras su paso por Ecuador, regres√≥ a Argentina para defender los colores de Defensores de Belgrano. Aqu√≠, solo estuvo media temporada, pues volvi√≥ a Ecuador, precisamente a T√©cnico Universitario. En este equipo, jug√≥ dos a√±os, disputando 19 partidos y metiendo siete goles. Despu√©s, se mud√≥ al Deportivo Cuenca, donde tuvo sus mejores momentos. En el cuadro ecuatoriano, jug√≥ 50 partidos y anot√≥ 21 goles, cifras que le permitieron llegar al Ismaily de Egipto. Lamentablemente, no pudo repetir sus buenos momentos y sali√≥ del club con rumbo al Nea Salamis de Chipre. En este equipo, ha disputado 53 partidos en una temporada y media, anotando 27 goles. Te recomendamos NUESTROS PODCASTS Las estafas digitales al acecho La ciberdelincuencia se ha sofisticado en gran medida por el avance tecnol√≥gico, estas amenazas inform√°ticas han generado un impacto significativo en las personas a nivel financiero y emocional, debido a las estafas digitales. Comparte esta noticia
